name: Short Eight
description:
A game created for the Blackthornprod 3ºrd game jam, a competition where all developers had one week to develop their games.

This game in specific was created in 3 days, because i was late to join.

The game is a platformer that could be considerably quite difficulty.

The thing that i would really like to add to the game is a story. (because in most games are the most important factor for me).

The thumbnail is really bad... i know... and i'm sorry, because i'm really sleepy!
